no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:

the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:

weaving together weals and woes.

who can break the spell of romance?

You are well-versed in poetry.
Zhen Yuandao taught his daughter well.

column3: 只是不知你是否担得起这个名字
column6: I wonder if you live up to this name.
Raise your head.

column3: 秀女姓甄犯了皇帝名讳
column6:
The name "Zhen" is an offense against the Emperor.
[His name is Yin Zhen]

column3: 禀太后当年臣女父亲为官
column6: Your Majesty, when my father became an official,

column3: 圣祖康熙看见父亲姓名
说姓甄好 听着像忠贞之士
column6: the prior emperor commended the name "Zhen".

He said this name connotes loyalty,
and to keep it as an encouragement.
I understand the prior emperor.

Imperial Mother, this reminds me of
the beauties of the Three Kingdoms Period:

column3: 江南有二乔 河北甄宓俏
column6:
"Lady Zhen north of the Yellow River,
and the two Qiaos south of the Yangtze."
The Zhens are known for their beautiful ladies.

column3: 甄宓就是汉末的三大美人之一
column6: Lady Zhen was one of the Three Beauties in the Eastern Han dynasty.
Come forward.
You carry yourself well.

“Slim-waisted and delicate are the slender beauties in King Chu's palace.
In springtime they wither, as flowers losing luster and fragrance."
But the winds and waters of my palace are nourishing.
You will not "wither like flowers."
Who is the other lady next to her?

column3: 苏州织造孙株合之妹孙妙青
column6:
Sun Miaoqing, age sixteen, sister of Sun Zhuhe,
the Chief of Suzhou Clothing Services.
Sun Miaoqing lost her manners before Her Majesty.

column3: 拉出去 永不许再选秀
column6: Take her out. She shall never attend another Selection.
Aye.

column3: 甄嬛留牌子 赐香囊
column6:
- Zhen Huan is selected. Bestow the sachet.
- Your Majesty, please forgive me!

Those who wished to stay have been dismissed,
while those who hoped for dismissal have remained.

column3: 能进宫是多少人巴不得的福气
column6: Many people dream to be blessed with a life in the palace.
Don't sigh over it.

Besides, we will enter the palace together.
We can take care of each other.

column3: 这会子宣旨的太监已经去了

column6:
The messenger eunuch must be on his way
to inform your parents. They will be overjoyed.

column3: 眉姐姐 我当真不是有心的
column6: But Meizhuang, I had no intention of being selected.
I know you didn't, but it was Heaven's intention.
Heaven does not "cast a bright pearl into darkness."
But His Majesty...

Sun Miaoqing was simply startled.
She meant no offense.

column3: 天子威重 孙妙青是太不稳重了
column6:
The Son of Heaven commands weighty authority.
We must also carry ourselves with poise and stability.
Greetings, My Ladies.

column3: 奴婢奉命送两位小主出宫
column6: I was instructed to conduct you to the gate, My Ladies.

column3: 恭贺两位小主荣获宫嫔
column6: I humbly congratulate you on becoming imperial concubines.
Here they come.
I wonder how it went.
Take care, Meizhuang.
You as well.
[list of selected candidates]
“The slender beauties in King Chu's palace.”

column3: 皇上 皇后娘娘求见
column6: Your Majesty, the Empress requests an audience.

- Show her in.
- Yes, Your Majesty.

I came to congratulate Your Majesty on gaining
several beautiful ladies once again.
What makes you say so?

column3: 今日选秀 皇上龙颜大悦
column6: The palaces all heard that Your Majesty was very pleased today.

column3: 总算有一两个质素尚可的
column6:
I was fortunate to come across a few adequate candidates
amidst the unremarkable crowds.
Not just adequate.

I heard that Shen Zishan's daughter bears some
resemblance of Concubine Estime.

column3: 而甄氏却长得活脱脱就
column6: And Miss Zhen looks exactly like ...

column3: 只是眉眼处有几分相像罢了
column6: Just a little bit on the eyes and brows.

column3: 有几分相似已经是很难得的了
column6: Even some likeness is extraordinary.

column3: 皇上准备给甄氏什么位分哪
column6:
Pardon my asking, but what rank does Your Majesty
plan to grant Miss Zhen?
How about Noble Lady?
Noble Lady...
Sounds good. Noble Lady it is.

column3: 除了前头满军旗的富察氏是贵人
column6:
In this case, there will be four Noble Ladies:
Lady Fuca from the Manchu Banners,

column3: 蒙军旗的博尔济吉特氏也是贵人
column6: Lady Borjigin from the Mongolian Banners,
and two from the Han Banners.
Two? Who is the other one?

column3: 沈贵人 沈自山的女儿
column6: Noble Lady Shen, daughter of Shen Zishan.

column3: 沈自山的官位可比甄远道要高
column6: Her father's position is higher than Zhen's.

Your Majesty esteems the Han banners,
but the marriage alliance between Manchus and Mongolians is customary.

column3: 这样做会不会太过显眼了
column6:
Couldn't two Noble Ladies in the Han Banners
catch a bit too much attention?

column3: 那就给甄氏正六品常在吧
column6:
In that case, she will be an Attendant.
[one rank below Noble Lady]

It's not appropriate for Han banners
to have a high rank when they enter the palace.
Yes, Your Majesty.
However, I wish to give her an honorary name.

column3: 那就叫内务府拟了封号来看
column6: I will ask the Household Department to propose a name.

column3: 不用 朕已经想好了
column6: No, I already have one in mind.
Come here.

Sourire.
[meaning "smile"]

column3: 臣妾记得在唐诗春词中
column6: I remember this character from a Tang poem about the spring:

"The lush willows branch their silken threads;
The dense spring flowers droop their misted eyes."

column3: 朕觉得甄氏莞尔一笑的样子
column6: The light smile on her face -
so pretty!

column3: 流朱 是不是快到家了
column6: Vermilion, are we almost home?
Yes, My Lady. Look, what a lively crowd!

column3: 来了 来了 来了

column6: Here she comes!
I see her!

column3: 恭喜 恭喜贺喜呀 恭喜恭喜
column6: Congratulations!
Congratulations, Mr. Zhen!
Father.

column3: 臣甄远道携全家参见小主
column6: Zhen Yuandao and family greets My Lady.
Peace to My Lady.

column3: 快起来 快起来 快起来
column6: What are you doing?

column3: 小主不可 这不合规矩啊
column6: Get up. Please get up!
My Lady, we must follow the protocol of greeting you.

column3: 老爷是应该向小姐行礼的
column6: My Lady, you are a member of the imperial family now.
Mr. Zhen is supposed to bow to you.
Exactly.

column3: 快把父亲母亲扶起来 快起来
column6: Vermilion and Jade, quickly, help my parents up.
Thank You, My Lady.

column3: 外面风大 进屋吧 进去再说
column6: It's windy out here. Let's go inside.
After you, My Lady.
Mind your step.

column3: 女儿不孝 不能承欢膝下
column6: I'm an unfilial daughter. I cannot serve my parents.

column3: 还要父亲母亲这般守规矩
column6: Please get up.
And I made my parents kneel to me.
My heart cannot rest easy.

- Please get up ...
- Please allow me to finish.
Although I've become a member of the imperial family,

column3: 还请父亲母亲准许女儿
在入宫之前仍以礼侍奉
column6:
I hope you will permit me to serve you
as your daughter before I enter the palace.

column3: 要不然女儿宁愿长跪不起
column6: I'll kneel here until you allow me to fulfil my filial duties.
Certainly.

column3: 我果然没有白养这个女儿啊
column6: You never let me down as my daughter.
Please stand up. Get up now.
Your Highness is awake.
Her Highness rises.
[Fuzi]

column3: 皇上昨儿歇在欣常在的宫里了
column6:
As per Your Highness's inquiry,
His Majesty stayed with Attendant Joie last night.

column3: 一来便去了那个贱人处
column6: His Majesty had not visited the harem for over ten days.
And that wretch was the first one he visited?

column3: 矫情那么些天还不够吗
column6:
A month has already passed since her miscarriage.
Isn't a few days of feigned feelings enough?

column3: 本宫瞧她狐媚劲又犯了
column6: Isn't she acting like a minx?

column3: 糊涂东西 也不仔细着点
娘娘恕罪 娘娘恕罪
column6: Idiot! Could you be any more careless?

column3: 你怎么当差的你 怎么当差的
column6: I beg Your Highness's pardon.

column3: 你存心要害娘娘 你存心的吧
column6: How can you be so incompetent?

column3: 我看你是存心要害娘娘的
column6: Are you deliberately hurting Her Highness?

column3: 一大早便在这儿闹得鸡犬不宁的
column6: Isn't that your intention? Is it?

Making "a ruckus of the fowls and dogs"
so early in the morning.
Take her out immediately!
Please spare me, Your Highness!
Come with me!
Please spare me! Your Highness!
Your Highness!
Your Highness!
Move!
Please forgive me!

column3: 娘娘 看样子华妃今儿是不来了
column6:
Your Majesty, it seems that Consort Fleur
won't come to pay her respects today.
Shall we adjourn now?

column3: 本宫是皇后 她是妃子
column6: She is a consort

column3: 她一定要来和本宫请安
column6: and she must pay respects to the Empress every morning.

column3: 再晚也要等下去 赐茶
column6: We will wait however late she is.
Provide tea.
Yes, Your Majesty.
Spring, serve the tea.
She's the last one again.

Her brother is Great General Nian,
who is in the prime of his powers.

column3: 皇上又那么宠爱着华妃
column6:
(Attendant Joie)
And His Majesty dotes on her so much.

(Consort Astuce)
She may be favored, but she's not the Empress.

column3: 人家上面那位才是正经的皇后
column6: She may be favored, but she's not the Empress.

column3: 倒是许久没有见端妃姐姐了
column6:
(Noble Lady Cao)
I haven't seen Consort Honnête for quite some time.
Consort Honnête? She can hardly leave her bed most days.

column3: 十天有九天都起不来床
column6:
(Concubine Estime, Concubine Beauté)
Consort Honnête? She can hardly leave her bed most days.
Consort Fleur is here.
Peace to Your Highness.
You may rise.

column3: 欣常在身子见好了 来得这样早
column6: Attendant Joie is here early.
Has your health improved?
I thank Your Highness for asking.
I felt a little unwell from rising earlier,

column3: 但是也不能耽误了给皇后请安哪
column6: but that cannot delay me from paying respects to Her Majesty.
That was thoughtful of you.
I hope you'll keep nourishing your health now the first month is past,

column3: 才能为皇上绵延子嗣呢
column6: so you will soon be ready to carry another child for His Majesty.
I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 欣常在虽然身子还有些不适
column6:
Your Majesty, although Attendant Joie still feels unwell,
her health has been much better than before.

column3: 本宫瞧这样子也是挺精神的
column6: I've noticed her healthy glow.

column3: 皇上见了一定会喜欢的
column6:
Consort Astuce's figure has filled out.
His Majesty will be delighted to see you.
Thank you for your kind words.
Oh, but I forgot.

column3: 皇上许久都没有去看过

column6: His Majesty has not been visiting you.

column3: 本宫记性差 姐姐莫怪罪
column6: I don't have a good memory. Please don't blame me.
It's all right.

column3: 好了 都是自己姐妹
不要一进来就站着说话
column6: We're all sisters here, we should not be standing while talking.
Please have a seat.
I thank Your Majesty.
Peace to Your Majesty.
Sit and have some tea.

column3: 绘春 给华妃娘娘上茶
column6: Spring, tea for Her Highness.
Is this last year's Dragon Well tea?
Your Majesty still keeps it?

column3: 即使存放得再好也有股子霉味
column6:
Old tea, however well stored,
still carries the smell of mildew.

column3: 臣妾都赏给颂芝她们了
column6: I gave mine to my maids.

column3: 臣妾那儿有今春新贡的雨前龙井
column6: I have received this year's pre-rain Dragon Well.

column3: 等下让颂芝拿一些过来
column6:
I will tell Songzhi to bring some
so Your Majesty can have a taste.
Thank you, I have received some from His Majesty as well.

column3: 不过本宫想着三阿哥喜欢

column6:
I thought the Third Prince would like it,
so I had it sent to Consort Astuce.
Of course,

column3: 齐妃姐姐那儿难得有这么好的茶
column6: it must be a rarity for Consort Astuce to receive such fine tea.

If the Third Prince needs anything else,
don't hesitate to ask me.
The Third Prince is a filial son.

column3: 不肯为一点小事打扰皇上
column6: He would not disturb His Majesty for trivial matters.
It's all owing to Consort Astuce's teaching.
The Third Prince has a filial heart indeed.

column3: 必会好读书 让皇上高兴的
column6: He surely will be studious to please His Majesty.
When His Majesty is pleased, he will award the Third Prince

column3: 就是金叶子也会照赏不误的
column6: not only leaves of tea, but even leaves of gold.

column3: 四阿哥与五阿哥还年幼
column6: The Fourth Prince and the Fifth Prince are still young.

column3: 三阿哥是诸位阿哥的表率
column6: All the princes look up to the Third Prince

column3: 所以三阿哥自然人品贵重
column6: and he naturally has an exemplary character.

His Majesty took the throne so recently
that the palaces are not fully equipped.

column3: 委屈皇后娘娘住这景仁宫了
column6: Especially Your Majesty's Palace of Great Benevolence.

column3: 臣妾想着挑个晴好的天
让人把这景仁宫好好装饰一下
column6: I intend to have it better embellished on a clear day

column3: 也好让皇后娘娘住得舒服
column6: to create a more comfortable dwelling for Your Majesty.
I appreciate your thought.

column3: 皇上才登基 一切从俭
column6:
It hasn't been long since His Majesty's enthronement.
Frugality is our prime consideration.
This matter can wait.
I admire your generous nature.

column3: 臣妾的翊坤宫就太过华丽了
column6: My Palace of Earthly Honor is too lavishly decorated.

column3: 臣妾每每来到皇后宫里请安
column6: Whenever I come here to pay my respects,
I always find myself ill at ease.

column3: 翊坤宫是先帝宜妃的住处
column6:
the Palace of Earthly Honor was occupied by
Consort Bonheur of the prior emperor.
That's why it is out of the ordinary.
Indeed. Consort Bonheur was greatly favored for being a prolific mother.

column3: 时候不早了 臣妾先告退了
column6: The hour is late.
I take my leave, Your Majesty.

column3: 皇后 臣妾也告退了
column6: Your Majesty, I will retire as well.
I bid Your Majesty goodbye.
Consort Fleur is impertinent.

column3: 娘娘三言两语就把她给打发了
column6: But Your Majesty always quiets her insolence with just a few words.

column3: 咱们景仁宫虽不是最富丽的
column6: But she wasn't wrong.

column3: 但却是个钟灵毓秀的吉祥地儿
column6:
The Palace of Great Benevolence may not be the most extravagant,
but it gathers good fortune and generous spirits.

column3: 娘娘仁厚 皇上钦赐景仁宫
column6: (Autumn)
His Majesty specially granted it in honor of your benevolence
for Your Majesty to dwell in harmony.

Your Highness, don't be angry.
The Empress was just jealous of our palace.

column3: 先帝的宜妃是得宠多子
column6: Consort Bonheur was favored for having many children.

column3: 可是儿子谋逆 连累母亲
column6: But her son's rebellion implicated her.
How dare she curse me this way?

column3: 您看皇后病歪歪的样子
column6: Your Highness must not take that to heart.

column3: 哪怕是身子好也不敢跟您争啊
column6: That sickly Empress wouldn't dare to compete with you.

column3: 就不怕皇上跟她置气吗
column6:
Whoever begrudges Your Highness's favor
is disrespecting His Majesty.
You know quite a lot.

column3: 只知道娘娘是皇上心尖上
column6:
I know nothing but Your Highness is
at the very center of His Majesty's heart.
Indeed.
Your Highness resides in the Palace of Earthly Honor.

column3: 这后宫里唯有咱们翊坤宫
和皇上皇后大婚时的坤甯宫
column6:
It is the only palace in the harem that represents the Earth,
like the ceremonial Palace of Earthly Tranquility.

column3: 娘娘在皇上心目中的分量啊
column6: Evidently, His Majesty sees Your Highness as his Empress.

column3: 皇上对皇后就只是情面上的
column6: His Majesty's respect for the Empress is only a matter of ceremony.

column3: 对娘娘您这才是没得说的
column6: Your Highness takes priority.

column3: 这位姐姐是甄姐姐的姐妹吗
column6: Is this the sister of Miss Zhen?
No, Jade and I are both her personal maids.

column3: 一个丫头都打扮得这么华丽
可想甄府是多么的气派啊
column6:
Even a maid is dressed so nicely.
The Zhen family must be very distinguished.

column3: 小姐在里面等着小主呢

column6: My Lady is waiting for you, and Mistress Zhen is home as well.
Please come inside.
Huan.

column3: 咱们姐妹无须这么客气
column6: No need to be so formal.

column3: 陵容与姨娘在京中无亲无友

column6:
I have no friends or family in Beijing.
I'm grateful to you for letting me stay here.
Now that you're here, I am your friend and family.
Please have a seat, Lady An.
Sit.
This is...
This is my aunt, Xiao.
She didn't want me to come to the capital alone.
Madam, please sit down.
Thank you.

I am deeply grateful for your kindness
to provide me a place to stay.

column3: 此恩此德陵容无以为报
column6: I am forever indebted to your compassionate care.
You're being courteous. Don't mention it.
How was the trip?

column3: 还说呢 方才去客栈
column6: Don't even get me started.

column3: 那老板以为安小主奇货可居

column6:
The innkeeper treated Lady An like a rare treasure
and insisted on her staying for longer.

column3: 结果被我好一通吓唬 给打发了
column6: And I took care of it by scaring him off.
We owed it to Vermilion's quick wit.

column3: 我们连赏钱都打发不出去

column6: Otherwise, the innkeeper would not have let us leave.

Vermilion is so clever.
That's all thanks to your guidance, Huan.
May I ask which month you were born in?

column3: 我今年十七 四月十七的生日
column6: I'm seventeen, born on the 17th day of the fourth month.

column3: 我今年十六 二月初九生的
column6: I am sixteen, born on the 9th day of the second month.

column3: 你还比我小呢 我得叫你妹妹
column6: You're younger. You will be my little sister then!

column3: 是 一切听从姐姐的
column6: Yes. Anything you say, Elder Sister.
Huan'er.

column3: 父亲 这么晚了还没歇息
column6: Father, you are still up at this hour?
Have a seat.
Thanks.

column3: 看你这几日照顾安小主行事稳当
column6: You have been taking good care of Lady An.

column3: 我的嬛儿已然长大成人了
column6: I can tell my daughter is a dependable adult now.

column3: 有句话为父本不便当面叮嘱你
column6: There's something I haven't been able to discuss with you face to face.

column3: 可是事到如今我顾不得了
column6: But now I feel compelled to do so.
You must remember:

column3: 若无完全把握获得皇上恩宠
column6: If you cannot ensure a place in His Majesty's affection,

column3: 你可一定要韬光养晦 收敛锋芒
column6: you must hide your light and blunt your sharp thorns.

column3: 为父不指望你日后大富大贵

column6:
You are not expected to be His Majesty's
favorite and most distinguished concubine.
I simply wish my beloved daughter

column3: 能舒心快乐 平安终老
column6: a peaceful and pleasant life in the harem.

column3: 女儿不求能获得圣上宠眷
column6: I seek not His Majesty's favor
but a steady life in the palace.

column3: 保住甄氏满门和自身性命即可
column6: I shall protect the lives of my family clan and my own.
Good.
That's good.

You can hear the flapping of a phoenix
but you will never see it.
column6:
A phoenix about to take flight rustles its wings
but the arc of its flight is unseen.

column3: What you see is the falling leaves from the phoenix tree.
column6:
The phoenix tree sways in the wind,
shedding memories in the whispers of the falling leaves.
